channel.title: My success story
channel.description:
Well, TBH I don't know how it began...but I do know it began with being the lowest level in godwars dungeon.
[IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/runescape%20stuff/GODWARSPIC1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/runescape%20stuff/GODWARSPIC2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/runescape%20stuff/lowlevelobby.jpg[/img]
Then, I guess I moved onto greater things...
I started thieving and getting more money every day and eventually I made my first 30M and got a BGS
[IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/Runescape%202/Untitled.png[/img] [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/Runescape%202/ROAR.png[/img]
I want to start off with my inspiration...my best friend in real life was getting rich fast, but I didn't know how, which inspired me to try different things...then I found this in an E-Mail he sent me...
[IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/Runescape%202/LOL.png[/img]
Probably not the best way to put this as my life on Runescape...but I loved skilling and that got me rich...
[IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/Runescape%202/kingly.png[/img]
Me catching a dragon but...look at the way my character is standing
[IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/Runescape%202/OHaiDer.png[/img]
Heres the original picture [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/Runescape%202/Untitled2.png[/img]
While skilling I managed to take this screenshot.
[IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/Runescape%202/1337.png[/img]
After doing smithing I decided to train summoning, and to get my charms, I killed Giant Rock Crabs. Heres a map to get 2 them.
[IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/Runescape%202/rc1.png[/img]
After watching my friend do a clue scroll, she showed me her 3rd age and after that my trade limit got messed up
[IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/Runescape%202/lolk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/Runescape%202/lolnewb.png[/img]
Adventures continued, and I gained more money and joined a clan...just a few of us standing around...Photoshop butchered the pic a bit...okay a lot...
[IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/Runescape%202/banner.png[/img]
Which brings me to my final picture...the picture I quit runescape on...This picture was taken during a pk trip, and as I rushed a pker, my clan bsed me and my bank went bye bye...
[IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/Runescape%202/screenie1.png[/img]
So yes, I've been places, lost stuff, and even got bsed...Runescape is like that...but you just gotta roll on

item.title: My success story
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

[quote=“Wtf Jack, post:4, topic:357065”]That’s a pretty epic story.

My favourite part was when you got bsed :P[/quote]

All good things come to an end…I got claw rushed by 10 people…10 specs…40 hits…can’t believe it…

Read full topic

item.title: My success story
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

Well, TBH I don’t know how it began…but I do know it began with being the lowest level in godwars dungeon.



Then, I guess I moved onto greater things…

I started thieving and getting more money every day and eventually I made my first 30M and got a BGS


I want to start off with my inspiration…my best friend in real life was getting rich fast, but I didn’t know how, which inspired me to try different things…then I found this in an E-Mail he sent me…

Probably not the best way to put this as my life on Runescape…but I loved skilling and that got me rich…

Me catching a dragon but…look at the way my character is standing

Heres the original picture

While skilling I managed to take this screenshot.

After doing smithing I decided to train summoning, and to get my charms, I killed Giant Rock Crabs. Heres a map to get 2 them.

After watching my friend do a clue scroll, she showed me her 3rd age and after that my trade limit got messed up


Adventures continued, and I gained more money and joined a clan…just a few of us standing around…Photoshop butchered the pic a bit…okay a lot…

Which brings me to my final picture…the picture I quit runescape on…This picture was taken during a pk trip, and as I rushed a pker, my clan bsed me and my bank went bye bye…

So yes, I’ve been places, lost stuff, and even got bsed…Runescape is like that…but you just gotta roll on

Read full topic
